services.title: Dental Implants | PR Dental Studio
services.content:
The Printers Row Difference
Patient Center
Meet Your Smile Artist
Smile Services
Smile Gallery
Chicago Veneers
Patient Reviews
connect with us
schedule an appointment
Dental Implants
schedule appointment
When it comes to replacing missing teeth, you have many replacement options. Dental implants are a long-term solution to replacing missing teeth, supporting your existing oral structures, and giving you back your freedom to live your life on your terms. When choosing an oral surgeon, it is imperative that you choose someone you trust. At Printers Row Dental Studio, Dr. Ema is highly-trained and experienced and is committed to providing unparalleled patient care, placing the best dental implants Chicago has to offer.
There are a number of reasons why you may need implants. If youâre looking for a trusted Chicago dentist, youâve come to the right place. Dr. Ema understands that dental implant surgery can be a great source of anxiety for many people, and she is proud to offer in-office amenities and sedation to make your experience as comfortable and painless as possible.
Why Replacing Teeth is Important
Replacing missing teeth is not a solely cosmetic concern. There are a number of side effects that you can experience if you donât close the gap left by missing teeth, including:
Changes to the shape of your face
More susceptible to tooth decay and gum disease
Changes to your bite because the surrounding teeth may start to shift
If youâre missing even one tooth, it is very important to explore your replacement option in order to preserve your long-term oral health.
What are Dental Implants
All on 4 Before
All on 4 After
Implants are posts that Dr. Ema surgically implants into your jawbone to act as a replacement for the root of your tooth. After the dental implant fuses to your jawbone, Dr. Ema will place a crown on top of the implant that will look and feel like a natural tooth.
By replacing a missing tooth with aÂ
dental implant
, Dr. Ema helps preserve your jawbone and, in turn, the overall structure of your face.Â One of the most effective and least invasive implants we offer at Printers Row Dental Studio is theÂ
All-On 4 treatment
Benefits of Implants
Dental implants are designed to look, feel, and function like natural teeth
Since the dental implant fuses with your bone, the discomfort of dentures is not a problem
With proper care, dental implants will last many years, and, in some cases, they can last the rest of your life
Dental Implants prevent further bone loss and help retain the shape and appearance of your face
They are permanent and stable
Number of Sessions
Dental implants are applied in three sessions on average. In the first session, a patientâs measurements are taken to create an implant that is perfectly matched to the patientâs jaw so that it fits well and will stay securely in place.
During the next two appointments, multiple sections of the implant are installed. This process happens in separate sessions to make sure each piece of the implant is securely in place before the next piece is added on.
Without a session dedicated to measurement, any implant inserted into the jaw will not fit correctly, coming loose or feeling very painful when being used to bite or chew food.
Â Pausing in between treatments also allows the patients to heal before the next procedure so that there is no unnecessary damage done or pain caused.
What Should I Expect?
Dental implant surgery includes the placement of the implants and the placement of the crowns over the implants. Dr. Ema will surgically place the posts into your jawbone, where it will fuse with the bone itself, supporting the surrounding bone structure. Once this process is complete, Dr. Ema will attach abutments to the posts. These abutments will hold your permanent crowns.
To learn more about the dental implants we offer, visit our
Â implants page on our Chicago Veneers site
We understand that surgery can be a frightening prospect for some, and at Printers Row Dental Studio, it is our goal to make your experience as stress-free as possible by providing you with our best care. We are here for anything you may need before, during, and after your surgery. Dr. Ema is specially trained to give you the highest quality of care and comfort.
If you need to replace missing teeth, donât wait any longerâimplants may be right for you!
For dental implants Chicago can trust, call our office today atÂ
(312) 435-0411
Â to schedule your appointment or
Â request one online

Dentures are a great option for replacing missing teeth. They can replace anywhere from few to all of your teeth, and can be supported by no teeth, limited teeth, or implants. With our digital denture process and fully supported prostheses, Printers Row Dental Studio offers the latest techniques in denture services. Weâll give you dentures you can wear with confidence!
At Printers Row Dental Studio, we are dedicated to transforming your smile into something youâre proud to show off!
We offer many cosmetic treatments! Printers Row Dental Studio and Chicago Veneers will give you a smile youâll be proud of! Visit our
Chicago Veneers website
to learn more about our cosmetic dentistry practice.

general.title: Best patient experience in Chicago, IL | Printers Row Dental Studio
general.content:
The Printers Row Difference
Patient Center
Meet Your Smile Artist
Smile Services
Smile Gallery
Chicago Veneers
Patient Reviews
connect with us
schedule an appointment
The Printers Row Difference
schedule appointment
The Difference
A bit of luxury
Like a five-star hotel, you can expect the unexpected with luxurious amenities including Netflix, warm blankets, eye mask, neck pillow, headphones, lavender aromatherapy and sedation options to keep you comfortable.
A heart for relationships
Driven by a desire to build lifelong friendships with our patients, we always take our time to listen closely to you and your story.
A smile artist with world class skill
As a Master in the Academy of General Dentistry, Dr. Ema is in the top 2% of dentists. Add to that, her teaching experience, AEGD residency, and over 2000 hours of continuing education, and you get stunning smile transformations and unrivaled dental expertise.
keep you in charge
Weâll diagnose, offer a full menu of solutions, and answer all your questions â but you always get to choose the care you want without any pressure from us.
modern technology
To make your care easier, faster, and more effective, we use leading-edge technology like digital x-rays, 2D and 3D radiography, high-definition photography, gunk-free digital impressions, diode lasers, a digital spectrophotometer for color matching, and more.
âOVERWHELMED with love, charm, & joy!â
Anytime you have to visit the dentist, there can be some anxiety. However, anytime I enter Printer's Row Dentall Studio, I am OVERWHELMED with love, charm, and joy! The team is exceptionally hospitable and Dr. Ema is not only one of the most high quality profressionals I've ever had the pleasure to meet, she makes me feel comfortable and safe in her care!
